name: THE ORIGINAL BBQ CHICKEN PIZZA
description: Created here in 1985. Our legendary BBQ sauce, smoked Gouda, red onions, and fresh cilantro transform this original to iconic. Also available with Nueske's applewood smoked bacon or fresh pineapple.

name: KOREAN BBQ STEAK PIZZA
description: Our Korean take on BBQ pizza. Charred steak, Korean BBQ sauce, Mozzarella cheese, scallions, shaved Napa cabbage, red onions, toasted sesame seeds and a sriracha-lime hot sauce.

name: BLACK AND BLEU PIZZA
description: Bleu cheese and steak are the ultimate classic pairing. We take our tender marinated grilled carne asada, Gorgonzola crumbles, garlic, olive oil, oven-roasted cherry tomatoes, and shaved red onions. Topped with cracked black pepper & parsley.

name: THE WORKS
description: Spicy Italian sausage, rustic pepperoni, Cremini mushrooms, Mozzarella, red onions, green peppers, olives, and wild Greek oregano.

name: PEPPERONI
description: Rustic and spicy pepperoni with fresh Mozzarella and wild Greek oregano. Also available with white truffle oil.

name: WILD MUSHROOM
description: Shaved Cremini mushrooms, extra virgin olive oil, fresh garlic, with Romano & Mozzarella, slivered scallions, and cracked black pepper. Also available with white truffle oil.

name: THAI CHICKEN
description: Thai peanut sauce and Mozzarella, hearth-baked then topped with crisp bean sprouts, julienned carrots, slivered scallions, and fresh cilantro.

name: SPICY CHIPOTLE CHICKEN
description: Chipotle adobo sauce, shaved poblanos and Monterey Jack with housemade roasted corn & black bean salsa, fresh cilantro, and tangy lime crema.

name: HAWAIIAN
description: Fresh pineapple, applewood smoked ham, and slivered scallions.

name: ITALIAN CHOPPED
description: Roasted turkey breast, julienned salami, garbanzo beans, tomatoes, Mozzarella, and fresh basil served with mustard herb vinaigrette.

name: SPICY BUFFALO CHICKEN CHOPPED SALAD
description: An American classic now on a salad. Grilled chicken tossed in our signature buffalo sauce on top of crisp Romaine lettuce with Monterey Jack and creamy Gorgonzola cheese, carrots, celery, scallions, and cilantro all served with our herb ranch dressing.

name: THE ORIGINAL BBQ CHICKEN CHOPPED SALAD
image: THE ORIGINAL BBQ CHICKEN CHOPPED SALAD.jpg
description: Black beans, sweet corn, jicama, fresh cilantro, basil, crispy corn tortilla strips, Monterey Jack, and our herb ranch. Topped with tomatoes and scallions. Also available with fresh avocado or grilled chili lime avocado.

name: CLASSIC CAESAR
description: Crisp Romaine lettuce with shaved Parmesan and smashed garlic butter croutons. Also available with grilled chicken, grilled shrimp, or sautéed salmon.

name: THAI CRUNCH
description: Crisp veggies and fresh cilantro with grilled chicken and the crunch of roasted peanuts & wonton strips. Served with our Thai peanut dressing and fresh lime. Also available with fresh avocado or grilled chili lime avocado.

name: CALIFORNIA COBB
description: Nueske's applewood smoked bacon, avocado, chicken, tomatoes, chopped egg, fresh basil, and Gorgonzola. Served with herb ranch or bleu cheese dressing.

name: BANH MI POWER BOWL
description: Quinoa, spinach, fresh cilantro & mint topped with grilled chicken, red cabbage, fresh avocado, cucumber, carrot, bean sprouts, scallions, and sesame seeds. Served with chili-lime vinaigrette and serrano peppers.

name: CHICKEN PICCATA
description: With linguini fini, lemon, capers, in a lemon cream sauce.

name: CHICKEN TEQUILA FETTUCCINE
description: Our creamy jalapeño lime sauce with spinach fettuccine, red onions, bell peppers, and fresh cilantro.

name: GARLIC CREAM FETTUCCINE
description: With fresh Italian parsley. Also available with chicken, shrimp and/or sautéed Cremini mushrooms.

name: BOLOGNESE SPAGHETTI
description: Our rich Bolognese sauce made with beef, pork, red wine, and fresh scallions. Also available with sautéed Cremini mushrooms.

name: SHRIMP SCAMPI ZUCCHINI
description: Our lighter spin on a traditional recipe. Zucchini ribbons sautéed with lemon, garlic, and white wine. Tossed with fresh Italian parsley, Parmesan, and a touch of fettuccine.

name: KUNG PAO SPAGHETTI
description: With garlic, scallions, peanuts, and hot red chilies. Also available with chicken and/or shrimp.

name: TOMATO BASIL SPAGHETTI
description: Flame-kissed Italian tomatoes, garlic, and basil.

name: JAMBALAYA LINGUINI FINI
description: Blackened chicken and shrimp, Andouille sausage, and Tasso ham in our spicy Cajun sauce.

name: SPICY BUFFALO CHICKEN BITES
description: Feeling like chicken instead of cauliflower? Try our crispy breaded chicken, lightly fried, then tossed in housemade sriracha buffalo sauce on top of ranch dressing. Topped with a salad of celery, cilantro, scallions, and Gorgonzola.

name: DYNAMITE SHRIMP
description: Crispy shrimp tossed in signature sweet & spicy sriracha sauce. Topped with slivered scallions and toasted sesame seeds.

name: MEXICAN STREET CORN
description: Roasted with smoked paprika, Feta and Parmesan. Served with fresh cilantro, lime, housemade ranchito sauce and grilled sourdough.

name: SPICY BUFFALO CAULIFLOWER
description: Fresh cauliflower florets buttermilk-battered and lightly fried, then tossed in housemade sriracha buffalo sauce on top of ranch dressing. Topped with a salad of celery, cilantro, scallions, and Gorgonzola.

name: SPINACH ARTICHOKE DIP
description: Served hot with housemade blue & white corn tortilla chips.

name: SZECHWAN CHICKEN DUMPLINGS
description: Topped with fresh cilantro, toasted sesame seeds, and scallions. Served with our soy-ginger chili sauce.

name: BUTTER CAKE
description: Trust us... just try it! Served warm with housemade whipped cream. Available with Vanilla Häagen Dazs.

name: RED VELVET CAKE
description: Frosted with hand-whipped vanilla bean cream cheese and white chocolate curls. Also available with vanilla Häagen Dazs.

name: KEY LIME PIE
description: On a graham cracker crust with housemade whipped cream.

name: BELGIAN CHOCOLATE SOUFFLÉ CAKE
description: Warm chocolate cake served with triple-thick hot fudge, housemade whipped cream and cacao nibs. Available with Vanilla Häagen Dazs.

name: TAKE AND BAKE KOREAN BBQ PIZZA
image: TAKE AND BAKE KOREAN BBQ PIZZA.jpg
description: Our Korean take on BBQ pizza. Charred steak, Korean BBQ sauce, Mozzarella cheese, scallions, shaved Napa cabbage, red onions, toasted sesame seeds and a sriracha-lime hot sauce.

name: TAKE AND BAKE BLACK AND BLEU PIZZA
image: TAKE AND BAKE BLACK AND BLEU PIZZA.jpg
description: READY TO BAKE - Bleu cheese and steak are the ultimate classic pairing. We take our tender marinated grilled carne asada, Gorgonzola crumbles, garlic, olive oil, oven-roasted cherry tomatoes, and shaved red onions. Topped with cracked black pepper & parsley.

name: TAKE AND BAKE THE ORIGINAL BBQ CHICKEN PIZZA
image: TAKE AND BAKE THE ORIGINAL BBQ CHICKEN PIZZA.jpg
description: READY TO BAKE - Created here in 1985. Our legendary BBQ sauce, smoked Gouda, red onions and fresh cilantro transform this original to iconic. Also available with Nueske's applewood smoked bacon or fresh pineapple.

name: TAKE AND BAKE CALIFORNIA CLUB
description: READY TO BAKE – Nueske’s applewood smoked bacon, grilled chicken, and Mozzarella, hearth-baked then topped with slices of avocado, fresh tomato, basil, and Romaine lettuce tossed in mayo. Top after baking.

name: TAKE AND BAKE FIVE CHEESE + FRESH TOMATO
image: TAKE AND BAKE FIVE CHEESE + FRESH TOMATO.jpg
description: READY TO BAKE - Fresh and traditional Mozzarella, Monterey Jack, smoked Gouda and Romano with tomato and fresh basil.

name: TAKE AND BAKE HAWAIIAN
description: READY TO BAKE - Fresh pineapple, applewood smoked ham and slivered scallions.

name: TAKE AND BAKE PEPPERONI
description: READY TO BAKE - Rustic and spicy pepperoni with fresh Mozzarella and wild Greek oregano. Also available with white truffle oil.
